titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the John Wesley Masland Papers, 1945
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Reports, minutes of meetings, directories, notes, and printed matter, relating to the United Nations Conference on International Organization at San Francisco and the founding of the United Nations.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], John Wesley Masland Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

controlaccess.head: Access Points
controlaccess.corpname: United Nations Conference on International Organization (1945 : San Francisco, Calif.)

did.unittitle: United Nations Conference On International Organization
General miscellaneous: Preamble, purposes, principles, Chairmen of Committees, Organization of Conference, General (English), Part 1.
Comments and proposed amendments concerning the Dumbarton Oaks proposals, May 7, 1945 (English).
Commission 4 - Judicial Organization, Preparatory Commission, Advisory Committee of Jurists, Executive Committee, Credentials Committee.
Steering Committee, Secretariat papers (Masland), Precis of Committee Proceedings, May 5-June 22, 1945.
Delegation Chairmen, Executive Secretary, New York Times-S. F. Chronicle, April 26-June 22, 1945, opening and closing day programs, verbatim minutes opening session.
Commission 1 - General Provisions ms, U.N. miscellaneous, directory of those attending.
Commissions 2-3 - Plenary and miscellaneous, Commission 4 - miscellaneous.
Commission 4 (French and Chinese); Coordination Committee, Commission 4 - Judicial Organization, Executive Committee, General (Spanish); General.
Countries at the U.N. Conference (Russian); General (Russian).
